thread.title: New tech turns movement into music

title: New tech turns movement into music
text:
New tech turns movement into music 5:20pm GMT - 01:49 
New technology that lets musicians control sounds using motion was centre stage at the National Association of Music Merchants' (NAMM) annual trade show. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
New technology that lets musicians control sounds using motion was centre stage at the National Association of Music Merchants' (NAMM) annual trade show. Matthew Stock reports.
